channel.title: Labs on Foundries.io
channel.description: Recent content in Labs on Foundries.io

item.title: Bluetooth Low Energy USB Dongle
item.description: Foundries.io has released binaries and source code for a Zephyr-based Bluetooth Low Energy USB dongle to the public.

item.title: JobServ CI
item.description: Automation is paramount to our success and to meet our ambitious goals we built the horizontally scalable open source CI system called JobServ.

item.title: Portainer-based App Store
item.description: Portainer is an open-source lightweight management UI which allows you to easily manage your docker hosts or swarm clusters.
